resource.chars:
Department, to accompany the Honorable 
Company’s Astronomer for the purpose men-
-tioned in the foregoing letter, and that 
travelling allowances at the usual rate 
be granted.
The Astronomer will be pleased to report the results of his ob-
servation for the information of Government 
Signed I. T. Thomas 
Secretary to Governt 
Ordered that the 
foregoing Extract be communicated to 
Lieutenant Ludlow, Superintendent 
of the Magnetic Observatory at Madras 
and to the Military Auditor General 
A true Extract 
[text?] Lieutenant Coll 
Deputy Secy to Govt
